record.dc:title: 152BN17 West Cuba Landing, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 13BN5. Note broken left femur. Startum I burial. Square 102R5. Direction east.
record.wpa:narrative: Adult female, on back, legs back and to left; forearms across visceral region. Semi-flexed burial oriented head North. The left femur of this skeleton appears to have been broken and seems to have a bony growth on it. The body rests on back with the skull bent forward till it rests on its chin. There were no artifacts.
